title: Clifford Barley
description: Clifford “Cliff” Barley was born on December 14, 1950, in Chico, California. He passed away on December 22, 2025, at the age of 75. Cliff was preceded in death by his beloved wife, Melinda Barley. Cliff leaves behind his son Martin, daughter in law, grandchildren, great grandchildren, special friend Linda Lawson, and dog Cleo. Cliff [...]

title: Madeleine Altube Nolta
description: Mass of Christian Burial will be held on Wednesday January 7, 2026 at 10:30 am at St. John the Baptist Catholic Church. title: Marilyn Frances Swieconek
description: Marilyn Frances Swieconek, 90, who spent most of her well-lived life in Marin County, passed away peacefully, surrounded by her family on Friday, December 12, 2025. She was born on June 5,1935, in New York, to the late Sylvester Sadlowski and the late Joan Witek. She was preceded in death by her husband of 67 [...]

title: Donald C. Thompson
description: Donald Charles Thompson, beloved father, grandfather, husband, U.S. Naval officer, engineer, sailor, reader, and devoted cat companion, died peacefully at home in Long Beach on November 19, 2025. He was 90. Born on Epiphany, January 6, 1935, Thompson grew up near the Pacific Ocean, a landscape that shaped both his life and his inner world. [...]

title: Father Cornelius “Neil” Healy
description: Father Cornelius “Neil” Healy, a dedicated servant of God, passed away peacefully on Saturday 12/20/2025 at the age of 83 in San Mateo, California.Father Healy’s life was marked by an unwavering commitment to his faith and the communities where he served. He was deeply loved for his thoughtful homilies, his gentle counsel to those in [...]

title: Diane Rae Gunter
description: Diane Rae Gunter, 86, passed on November 2, 2025 at her home in Soquel surrounded by family. Born May 13, 1939, in Soquel, she graduated from Santa Cruz high school where she met her husband, Jesse Edwin Gunter.She is survived by her daughter, son, grandchildren, and great grandchildren and is pre-deceased by her husband. Diane [...]

title: Increase in free book vouchers
description: The discount on books created by the government to encourage reading habits in young people will increase by 10 euros, according to the decree published in the Official Gazette.

title: Follow simple step to turn leftover roast potatoes into crispiest dish ever
description: We've all been there - you've cooked too much food and now you're left with a fridge full of leftovers. But don't despair, there's a simple method to make the most of your unused roasties

title: Anton Vinzon and Carmelle Collado's billboards light up New York City

title: Susan Louise Matulich
description: Susan Louise Matulich, born in El Centro, California on February 1, 1950, passed away on December 5, 2025, at De Un Amor Care Facility. Susan attended Notre Dame Grammar School, Watsonville High School, and after that, obtained her bachelor’s and master’s degrees from San Jose State University.
